verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. I waited <WH6960> <WH8765> patiently <WH6960> <WH8763> for the YY <WH3068>; and he inclined <WH5186> <WH8799> unto me, and heard <WH8085> <WH8799> my cry <WH7775>.

He brought me up <WH5927> <WH8686> also out of an horrible <WH7588> pit <WH953>, out of the miry <WH3121> clay <WH2916>, and set <WH6965> <WH8686> my feet <WH7272> upon a rock <WH5553>, and established <WH3559> <WH8790> my goings <WH838>.

And he hath put <WH5414> <WH8799> a new <WH2319> song <WH7892> in my mouth <WH6310>, even praise <WH8416> unto our 'Elohim <WH430>: many <WH7227> shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> it, and fear <WH3372> <WH8799>, and shall trust <WH982> <WH8799> in the YY <WH3068>.

Blessed <WH835> is that man <WH1397> that maketh <WH7760> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> his trust <WH4009>, and respecteth <WH6437> <WH8804> not the proud <WH7295>, nor such as turn aside <WH7750> <WH8802> to lies <WH3577>.

Many <WH7227>, O YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>, are thy wonderful <WH6381> <WH8737> works which thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804>, and thy thoughts <WH4284> which are to us-ward: they cannot be reckoned up in order <WH6186> <WH8800> unto thee: if I would declare <WH5046> <WH8686> and speak <WH1696> <WH8762> of them, they are more <WH6105> <WH8804> than can be numbered <WH5608> <WH8763>.

Sacrifice <WH2077> and offering <WH4503> thou didst not desire <WH2654> <WH8804>; mine ears <WH241> hast thou opened <WH3738> <WH8804>: burnt offering <WH5930> and sin offering <WH2401> hast thou not required <WH7592> <WH8804>.
Then said <WH559> <WH8804> I, Lo, I come <WH935> <WH8804>: in the volume <WH4039> of the book <WH5612> it is written <WH3789> <WH8803> of me,
I delight <WH2654> <WH8804> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> thy will <WH7522>, O my 'Elohim <WH430>: yea, thy Torah <WH8451> is within <WH8432> my heart <WH4578>.

I have preached <WH1319> <WH8765> righteousness <WH6664> in the great <WH7227> congregation <WH6951>: lo, I have not refrained <WH3607> <WH8799> my lips <WH8193>, O YY <WH3068>, thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8804>.

I have not hid <WH3680> <WH8765> thy righteousness <WH6666> within <WH8432> my heart <WH3820>; I have declared <WH559> <WH8804> thy faithfulness <WH530> and thy salvation <WH8668>: I have not concealed <WH3582> <WH8765> thy lovingkindness <WH2617> and thy truth <WH571> from the great <WH7227> congregation <WH6951>.
Withhold <WH3607> <WH8799> not thou thy tender mercies <WH7356> from me, O YY <WH3068>: let thy lovingkindness <WH2617> and thy truth <WH571> continually <WH8548> preserve <WH5341> <WH8799> me.

For innumerable <WH4557> evils <WH7451> have compassed <WH661> <WH8804> me about: mine iniquities <WH5771> have taken hold <WH5381> <WH8689> upon me, so that I am not able <WH3201> <WH8804> to look up <WH7200> <WH8800>; they are more <WH6105> <WH8804> than the hairs <WH8185> of mine head <WH7218>: therefore my heart <WH3820> faileth <WH5800> <WH8804> me.
Be pleased <WH7521> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>, to deliver <WH5337> <WH8687> me: O YY <WH3068>, make haste <WH2363> <WH8798> to help <WH5833> me.

Let them be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799> and confounded <WH2659> <WH8799> together <WH3162> that seek <WH1245> <WH8764> after my soul <WH5315> to destroy <WH5595> <WH8800> it; let them be driven <WH5472> <WH8735> backward <WH268> and put to shame <WH3637> <WH8735> that wish <WH2655> me evil <WH7451>.
Let them be desolate <WH8074> <WH8799> for a reward <WH6118> of their shame <WH1322> that say <WH559> <WH8802> unto me, Aha <WH1889>, aha <WH1889>.

Let all those that seek <WH1245> <WH8764> thee rejoice <WH7797> <WH8799> and be glad <WH8055> <WH8799> in thee: let such as love <WH157> <WH8802> thy salvation <WH8668> say <WH559> <WH8799> continually <WH8548>, The YY <WH3068> be magnified <WH1431> <WH8799>.

But I am poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34>; yet the YY <WH136> thinketh <WH2803> <WH8799> upon me: thou art my help <WH5833> and my deliverer <WH6403> <WH8764>; make no tarrying <WH309> <WH8762>, O my 'Elohim <WH430>.
